SQL.LOAD: SELECT ui_prog_code, english_translation, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by, approved, dict_item_id, imported, msg_code, msg_type, msg_parameter_count, new_dict_item_id FROM elp_new_dictionary_item WHERE new_dict_item_id = :new_dict_item_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select new_dict_item_id, ui_prog_code, english_translation, approved, dict_item_id, imported, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by, msg_code, msg_type, msg_parameter_count from elp_new_dictionary_item
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_new_dictionary_item SET ui_prog_code = :ui_prog_code, english_translation = :english_translation, approved = :approved, dict_item_id = :dict_item_id, imported = :imported, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE new_dict_item_id = :new_dict_item_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_new_dictionary_item ( ui_prog_code, english_translation, approved, dict_item_id, imported, created_by, msg_code, msg_type, msg_parameter_count, new_dict_item_id ) VALUES ( :ui_prog_code, :english_translation, :approved, :dict_item_id, :imported, :created_by, :msg_code, :msg_type, :msg_parameter_count, :new_dict_item_id )
